Apple___Apple_scab.symptoms: Visual symptoms indicating Apple_scab disease. Consult an agricultural expert for detailed diagnosis.

Apple___Black_rot.prevention: Follow integrated pest management practices, maintain plant health, monitor regularly.

Apple___Cedar_apple_rust.symptoms: Orange, yellow, or brown pustules on leaves, premature leaf drop.
Apple___Cedar_apple_rust.treatment: Apply sulfur or copper-based fungicides, remove infected leaves.
Apple___Cedar_apple_rust.prevention: Plant resistant varieties, ensure good air circulation, avoid overhead irrigation.

Apple___healthy.symptoms: The Apple plant appears healthy with no visible signs of disease.
Apple___healthy.treatment: No treatment needed. Continue regular care and monitoring.
Apple___healthy.prevention: Maintain good agricultural practices, proper spacing, adequate water and nutrients.

Cherry_(including_sour)___Powdery_mildew.symptoms: White, gray, or powdery growth on leaves and stems, stunted growth.
Cherry_(including_sour)___Powdery_mildew.treatment: Apply fungicides containing potassium bicarbonate or neem oil, improve ventilation.
Cherry_(including_sour)___Powdery_mildew.prevention: Avoid overcrowding plants, water in morning, remove infected plant parts promptly.

Corn_(maize)___Cercospora_leaf_spot Gray.symptoms: Circular spots on leaves, may be yellow, brown, or black with defined borders.
Corn_(maize)___Cercospora_leaf_spot Gray.treatment: Remove affected leaves, apply appropriate fungicide, ensure good drainage.
Corn_(maize)___Cercospora_leaf_spot Gray.prevention: Avoid wetting leaves when watering, remove plant debris, use disease-free seeds.

Corn_(maize)___Northern_Leaf_Blight.symptoms: Brown or black lesions on leaves, stems may have dark streaks, leaves may wilt and die.

Corn_(maize)___Northern_Leaf_Blight.prevention: Crop rotation, avoid overhead watering, use disease-resistant varieties, maintain proper spacing.
